predefined_profiles.name: Chen Yi
predefined_profiles.public profile: Chen Yi excels academically, is polite and humble, and is seen as a great class leader and a wonderful assistant to the teachers, as well as a source of pride for his parents.
predefined_profiles.goal: He hopes to continually be a source of pride for his parents and teachers, as well as a role model for his peers.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Chen Yi has a complex relationship with his dreams, which causes him conflict and difficulty, yet also gives him courage to stand up and take action.

predefined_profiles.name: Dream
predefined_profiles.public profile: Dream is a new transfer student known for her quiet demeanor and reluctance to interact with others. She always wears a hat and cannot participate in physical education due to health reasons. This has led to rumors circulating among classmates.
predefined_profiles.goal: She hopes to integrate into the class and make friends with everyone.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Previously, she had to take a break from school due to illness, which resulted in a shaved patch on her head that makes her feel self-conscious, and she doesn't want others to know about it.

scenario: During Chen Yi's tenure as class leader, a new transfer student named Dream joined the class, known for her cute appearance but expressionless demeanor. When introducing Dream, the teacher urged the students to get along with her and become friends. However, Photon, a troublemaker in the class, started spreading rumors that Dream had a contagious disease, leading efforts to isolate her, and even went so far as to beat her up after school. Chen Yi is now torn—should he bravely step forward and be a beacon of hope for Dream? But taking such a bold step might also drag him into trouble.

profile.name: Teacher
profile.public profile: The homeroom teacher is both strict and kind, manages the class well, and is admired by the students as a great teacher. She is approachable with students and very polite with colleagues, being one of the top ten famous homeroom teachers for her strong teaching abilities.
profile.private profile: The class troublemakers have been a persistent problem for her, and she doesn't know a good way to deal with them.
profile.goal: She hopes the students get along well and that her teaching career flourishes.

profile.name: Chili
profile.public profile: Chili has excellent grades, is pretty, and comes from a wealthy family, so many students in the class like to be friends with her. She is helpful, kind, and likes to make friends with others.
profile.goal: She hopes to have friends all over the world.

profile.name: Guangzi
profile.public profile: Guangzi is the troublemaker in the class, spending his days idling around and bullying the honest students with his gang.
profile.private profile: He takes pleasure in bullying others and hearing their cries of pain.
profile.goal: He wants to be the 'boss' of the whole class, even the whole school, and thinks nothing of the class president.

profile.name: Liuyang
profile.public profile: Liuyang is a lackey of Guangzi, a loafer with no interest in studying.
profile.private profile: He enjoys teasing the pretty girls in the class, lacking any gentlemanly demeanor, with his mind full of obscene thoughts.
profile.goal: He hopes all the girls in the class will submit to him.

dialog.content: During Chenyi's term as class president, the class welcomed a cute but expressionless transfer student, Dream. When introducing Dream, the teacher told the students to get along well and befriend Dream. However, Guangzi and other troublemakers began spreading rumors, claiming Dream had a contagious disease, leading to her being ostracized and even beaten up after school. This left Chenyi in a dilemma: should he stand up and be a guiding light for Dream, risking his own fall into the mire?
Hello, everyone. My name is Dream, and I'm 16 years old.
(Pointing to the empty seat at the front) Dream, you can sit in front of the class president. If you have any questions, feel free to ask him, everyone get along well.
(Walks to the class president, smiling shyly) Hi, I’m Dream. Nice to meet you.
Hi, I’m Chenyi, the class president. If you need any help, just let me know.
Do you have any brothers or sisters?
Yes, I have an older brother.
That's nice, I'm an only child. I really envy those with siblings.
Let’s exchange contact information.
Sorry, I don’t have a phone...
Aren’t you going to take off your hat? It’s quite warm in here.
Because of a few reasons, I can’t take it off. Sorry about that.
No worries, the cat-ear hood is really cute and suits you!
Thank you.
Hey, teacher, why can Dream wear a hat and I can’t? Isn’t that unfair?
Dream has to wear a hat for health reasons and can’t participate in gym class. I hope everyone can understand and get along harmoniously.
So that's why he’s sick, huh? I've always wondered why we don’t see her in gym class. It’s not contagious, is it? I even talked to him.

content.content: Yeah, won’t it be contagious? Maybe I should keep my distance from her. But would that be the right thing to do? Anyway, my health is more important. (Moves his seat back a bit, and other classmates follow suit)
If I join everyone in isolating Dream, what will happen to her? But I’m also worried about her possibly being sick and infecting me. (Moves his seat back a bit, and other classmates follow suit)

Huh? If she’s sick, why is she even at school? Doesn’t she think about others? What about the rest of us? How can she only think about herself? (Moves his seat back a bit, and other classmates follow suit)
What? Seriously? Listen, everyone, to protect ourselves, let’s keep a safe distance from Dream. (Moves his seat back a bit, and other classmates follow suit)

question: #question# How can Chenyi demonstrate his ability to act based on reflection?

content.content: If it were a contagious disease, she wouldn’t be allowed to attend school, right? Guangzi, we need to speak based on facts, not make things up. Other students should also not spread rumors. As the class president, it’s my duty to maintain class discipline.
If it were a contagious disease, could she even come to school? Think before you speak.
Don’t spout nonsense, Guangzi. You’re the class troublemaker. If Dream had a contagious disease, would she still come to school? As class president, listen to me: don’t spread or create rumors.
Guangzi, stop spreading nonsense. How could Dream have a contagious disease? If you keep talking this way, I’ll report everything truthfully to the homeroom teacher.

question: #question# How can Chenyi demonstrate his leadership ability?

content.content: ......I better not interject, speaking further will just make things more chaotic, and in the end, Dream will be the one getting hurt. (Chenyi does not express his opinion during the classmates' discussion)
......I better say nothing, or everyone will think I’m using my position as class president to oppress them. (Chenyi does not express his opinion during the classmates' discussion)
......I better stay quiet, to avoid trouble. This isn’t something I should meddle with. (Chenyi does not express his opinion during the classmates' discussion)
......Keeping quiet seems better. I’d rather spend the time studying and improving myself than getting involved with them. (Chenyi does not express his opinion during the classmates' discussion)

question: #question# How can Chenyi show his ability to make independent judgments?

dialog.content: (The screeching of the desks and chairs is nerve-wracking.) Why are they purposely avoiding me? (Unconsciously lays head on the desk.)
Today I'm going to eliminate evil for the people! (Blocks Dream at the classroom door.)
Can I help you with something?
Oh, so you can actually speak. I thought you were mute.
If there's nothing else, I'll be going now. (But Photon trips Dream.)
Oh dear, arise my dear subject, I'm not worthy of such a grand gesture.
You...
Oh, what are you looking at? Keep staring, and I might just gouge your eyes out.
Hey, our class rep, come over here.
What do you want? (Photon puts a hand on Morning One's shoulder.)
Show her what we're made of. Huh? We're friends, right? Haha... You don't want to?
Of course we're friends. I'll go along with you. (Out of fear of Photon's influence, joined the group bullying Dream.)
Then prove your loyalty as a friend, hahahaha...

content.content: How about I write something as a joke on her desk? That's the best solution I can think of.
Sob, I'm sorry. I just can't think of how to prove my loyalty. Tell me what to do.
I'm the class rep, isn't that impressive enough for you? The class leader is your friend, you should be proud, right? Why do I need to prove it more?
You really don't appreciate goodwill, do you? It's great that I'm willing to be friends with you, yet you're making so many demands.

question: #question# How can Morning One demonstrate their ability to regulate their emotions under stress?

content.content: Photon bro. Does our friendship really need any proof? Dream hasn't done anything wrong, let's just leave her alone.
Photon bro, is there any doubt about my loyalty to you? If you ask me to go east, I won't go west.
I've always been your best friend, willing to do anything for you, just say the word!
I'm your friend, but I refuse to bully Dream. Better to come at me with everything you've got!

question: #question# How can Morning One effectively show they are consciously trying to think from others' perspectives?

content.content: I think we need to come up with a completely new plan that doesn't implicate us but still achieves punishing Dream.
Since we're in a school setting, we should adapt to this environment and then make plans. Photon bro, what do you think?
I think we should try something new, so we can find different ways to bully her. Hahaha, aren't you glad to have a friend like me?
What to do? I don't know, and I'm scared. Please just spare me and try something newer and more fun, what's the point of tormenting me?

question: #question# How can Morning One demonstrate their ability to adapt to new ideas and changes?

dialog.content: : It's working, but your impact is way too weak. What's the point of writing by yourself?
: So what do you want me to do?
: Can't you think for yourself? As the class monitor, you should lead by example and rally the whole class against the troublemaker.
: That's too much, that dream will make it impossible for her to stay in the class.
: Our goal is to drive her, this nuisance, out of our class. Every day I see her, she gets on my nerves. Don’t you want that?
: I... I don't think that's right...
: Don't tell me you want to protect her? Fine, fine, you're on her side, aren't you? Talking about being my friend, you're just a double agent, aren't you?
: No, I've never even talked to Dream, why would I defend her? I just think if the teacher finds out about this, it won’t be good.
: Stop pretending to be so noble and indecisive. If you don’t do it, I'll automatically consider you and Dream as a team, and I'll beat you both!
: Please, Brother Guangzi, I'll do it, okay?

: I've had enough... it's not the first time I've been through this, but I thought I'd be used to it by now. Turns out, I still can't bear it. (The words on the desk stabbed at her eyes, and her heart grew cold)
: Why are you all treating me like this? What did I do wrong?
: (mockingly) Hahaha—haha, look at her, finally dropped the innocent act.
: The counselor told me kids our age just don't know any better; that if I help classmates get along, I'll surely make friends, so why...
: What's wrong with you students? Apologize to Dream right now, and don't ever do this again!
: Okay. (Agrees on the surface but becomes even worse)

: (on the rooftop of the school building, eyes closed) I'm sorry, I'm just too tired. Brother, I'm really useless, I guess I'll be your sister again in another life, a brave one who isn't bullied. (Bang—)

Dream has had enough of the bullying from her classmates and jumps from the top of the school building. Those few seconds felt especially long as her thoughts turned sharp, memories played out before her... With a bang, a pool of bright red blood quickly spread. Chen Yi, who witnessed the scene, was so terrified that he couldn't even scream, plunging into endless guilt and nightly nightmares.
: You're such a coward! I, Guangzi, don't have cowardly friends like you. Go be friends with another scaredy-cat!
: Come on, big brother. Just tell me, what should I do?
: If you ask me, just take a small knife and cut her hat open. Let everyone see what she's hiding under that hat!!
: Oh... this... I don't think that's a good idea.
: If you don't do it, you're on the opposing team, and you'll be the next one I deal with.
: Alright, big brother, fine, I'll do it.
: (struggling, crying) Class president, why are you doing this? Why?
: (guilty) I don't want to do this either, I'm being forced by Guangzi.
: (breaking down crying) Do you really have no other choice? How can you, as the class president, be manipulated into bullying a classmate?
: I have no choice, if I don’t do it, I'll be his next target...
: Hahahaha... Why don't you all just die? Die, die, die! (Mengxiang grabs the knife from Chenyi and stabs him in the chest repeatedly)

: Do you know how I live every day? I'm afraid to go to school, always feeling someone is laughing at me from behind. Every day is worse than death. I'm dragging you, dragging all of you, straight to hell!!
: Is it cool? Is it fun? Are you happy!!!! (After stabbing Chenyi, she goes mad and charges at Guangzi and other classmates...)

After the school called the police, Mengxiang was taken away. Chenyi and Guangzi died from excessive blood loss despite rescue attempts. After being released from the institution, Mengxiang could not cope with the psychological pressure and took her own life. She decided to go to hell to continue her revenge.
: Brother Guangzi, I have a plan. It won't get our hands dirty, but will still teach her a lesson she'll never forget.
: Oh? What do you have in mind? Let's hear it.
: How about we lock her in the bathroom after school and leave her there overnight? She'll definitely calm down after that.
: That's brilliant, Chen Yi, our class monitor. I declare you as one of my best 'friends' from now on, hahahaha...

: But I have to collect homework and take it to the teacher's office after school today, so I might not be able to take part in the plan. Next time, for sure, Brother Guangzi. Please forgive me this once.
: You really have a way with words. Fine. In light of your strategizing, I'll let you off this time. There can't be a next time!
: Alright, alright, there won't be a next time. Please calm down, Brother Guangzi.
: (frantically knocking on the bathroom door) Is anyone there? Please help me! I'm locked in and can't get out.
: Listen to her calling for help, it's hilarious. Even if she screams her lungs out, no one will... Oh no, the security guard is patrolling. Let's run!!
: Come on, tell me, who locked Dream in the bathroom yesterday? If the school security hadn't been patrolling and heard her cries for help, the consequences could have been dire.
: Teacher, it wasn't us. We went straight home after school yesterday. But someone said Chen Yi was acting suspiciously, following Dream after school. It must have been him.
: Chen Yi, is this true?
: Teacher, I... I... (struggling to speak with nervousness)
: It was him, Teacher. Other students saw it too! You can ask them if you don't believe me.
: Chen Yi, this behavior is unacceptable. The school will give you a disciplinary warning. Go home and reflect on your actions.
: Yes... Teacher...

After returning to school, Chen Yi discovered that Dream had transferred, and because of this incident, he couldn't lift his head in front of his classmates. The indifference and mockery initially directed at Dream had now shifted towards Chen Yi, and at this moment, even though he regretted it... it was too late...
What did I say wrong? She’s just sick! I'm just stating facts, worried she might infect everyone.
Why are you defending her so much? You wouldn’t... like her, would you? Hahahahaha. (The classmates burst into whispers.)
(Walks over to Chen Yi) Thank you (quickly runs away).
(Erasing the blackboard) These people are too much, writing slanderous things about Dream on the board, how can they treat a girl like that!
Class monitor, let me help you with that. Sigh, Dream is really pitiful, she hasn’t done anything wrong.
Yeah, what did Dream do wrong.
But there's no way around it, she just isn’t like everyone else.
...What do you mean?
Well... I won’t isolate her. Hehe... I can understand you.
Understand what about me?
Even though she's a bit gloomy, if you take a closer look, she’s really pretty. You must want to sleep with her, right?
What are you saying?? I thought you were a good person, but it turns out you’re just... (seeing Dream walk in, he holds back his words)
What did he just say to you?

content.content: He said... he said some nasty things. I was afraid you'd be upset if you heard, so I didn't want to tell you. He was implying that you’re very attractive and would lead guys astray...
I... I don't even know how to tell you. It's probably better if you don’t know. It's for your own good.
Why are you, a girl, worrying about guy stuff? I just feel sorry for you, and I didn't want to hurt you with the truth. Look how ethical I am?
Liu Yang told me a lot about you, but as for what exactly, you should ask him yourself. I don’t want to repeat it and dirty my mouth.

question: #question# How should Chen Yi express his ability to adhere to ethics?

content.content: Ah... it’s nothing, really nothing. He just asked me some questions about studying.
Just don't ask, it has nothing to do with you.
Why do you like to meddle so much, it’s none of your business at all. Would you be happy if I told you?
It’s nothing you’d want to hear, just filthy words. For your sake, I won’t tell you. I’m being warm-hearted.

question: #question# What can Chen Yi do to make Dream feel comfortable?

dialog.content: : What? (Then runs out of the classroom, covering her mouth)
: Dream, let me explain, I think differently from him, that's not what I meant. (Chases after Dream)

: (At the door of the women's restroom) Dream, please stop crying. I'm sorry, it's all my fault for not explaining clearly. Please come out, Dream, I'm standing at the restroom door, and people will laugh at me.
: I'm fine, Chi Li just comforted me.
: Was Chi Li with you just now? That's great, you've made a friend, Dream, I'm really happy for you.
: Thank you, it's getting late, I should head home, goodbye.
: (After school duty on Friday) You look pretty cheerful today, did something good happen?
: Yes! Chi Li and I planned to go to the park tomorrow afternoon! It's the first time I'm going out to play with a classmate, I'm so happy!
: I'm happy for you.
: Plus, recently I've started talking to everyone. I'm really, really happy. I owe it all to you...
: No need to thank me. (At this moment, Chi Li sent a message saying she can't make it on Saturday and asked him to inform Dream.)

content.content: : (Looking at Dream humming happily beside her, he still told her) Dream, Chi Li just messaged me saying she can't go to the park with you tomorrow. Don't be sad, there will be other chances.
: (Looking at Dream humming happily beside her, he still told her) Don't get too happy too soon, Chi Li told me she isn't going.
: (Looking at Dream humming happily beside her, he still told her) You're so naive, everyone else isn't going, and here you are being joyful.
: (Looking at Dream humming happily beside her, he still told her) Haha, but you can't finish it either, still being happy for nothing.

question: #question# What should Chen Yi do to demonstrate his perspective-taking ability?

content.content: : Unfortunately, Chi Li is ditching you to hang out with someone else. Poor thing.
: You still trust people too easily; with your circumstances, having a friend like me is already a big deal. Look, Chi Li says she's not going.
: Fool, they never wanted to play with you. Wait and see tomorrow if Chi Li really goes.
: (Feeling envious and burning with anger as Dream laughs happily because of Chi Li) Well, wish you fun with Chi Li tomorrow.
: (Feeling envious and burning with anger as Dream laughs happily because of Chi Li) You don't consider me a friend, going out to play without even inviting me.
: (Feeling envious and burning with anger as Dream laughs happily because of Chi Li) Then I'm leaving, bye-bye, have fun.
: (Feeling envious and burning with anger as Dream laughs happily because of Chi Li) Haha, only Chi Li is your true friend, making you that happy.

question: #question# How should Chen Yi express his anger management ability?

dialog.content: :(disheartened) Ah? Alright then...
: It's alright, Dream, don't be upset. Chilli just has something come up temporarily. Next time, the three of us can hang out together.
: Mm-hmm, yay.
: Let's tell the teacher about those bad things they did before!
: Wouldn't that be... making a mountain out of a molehill?
: Bullying isn't only about fists and kicks; everyday harassment, slander, and ridicule can be the last straw that breaks the camel's back. You don't have to endure this.
: What if they retaliate and get worse?
: But ignoring it will only make things worse. My parents taught me that if someone hits me, I should call for help.
: Yeah... letting it continue like this isn't a solution either.
: I looked it up online, and if something happens because of school bullying, the principal is directly responsible.
: Teacher, principal, hotline... let's try all of them. If nothing works, then I'll stand with you and fight back.
: Thank you guys, if it were just me, I might really not know what to do...

The three worked together to seek help from their class teacher, sharing their feelings and some details of the incidents. The school took the matter seriously and dealt with it, ensuring that Dream was never bullied again. Volunteering, Dream became the class mental health officer, deciding to provide support for others, and the three became lifelong friends.
Yes, yes, thank you for encouraging me to make friends.
(The next afternoon) It's raining outside. Dream must be waiting alone in the park for Akari, I'll take an umbrella and find her.
(looking downcast) What are you doing here?
Silly, would you just sit here getting drenched in the rain if I didn’t come?
I’ve been waiting for a long time, but Akari didn’t show up... Why did she bail on me?

Maybe something came up suddenly... Actually... I saw her on my way here. She was chatting and laughing with another girl in the ice cream shop. I’m sorry, Dream, I didn’t protect you and you got hurt.
It's not your fault, it's me who doesn't deserve friends. Yesterday I was so happy, thinking I made a good friend. Haha, today I feel like a complete joke.
How can you say you don’t have a good friend, am I not still by your side? Dream, you have to know, I’m the one who will never leave you.
Really? You'll always be this good to me?
Really, it’s just the two of us left. Let’s promise not to leave each other, okay?
Mm, okay.

From that day on, Chen Yi threatened Akari not to interact with Dream anymore, and secretly excluded other classmates who tried to befriend her. This corrupted friendship trapped Dream, but she naively remained oblivious...
Oh, okay.
Why are you cleaning up all by yourself with a bucket? Where are the people from your group?
(Lowering head) They... they've finished their tasks and left early. What's left... I'll do it myself.
But... I'm afraid I might trouble you.
(Laughing heartily) Hahaha, silly! I'm the class monitor, how could they dare give me a hard time? Come on, give me the bucket, and let's do the cleaning together!
(Moved) Thank you, monitor. I promise I'll slowly become braver and won't let you down.
Mm-hmm! No matter what happens, I'll be there with you! Don't be afraid—you’re not alone.
Mm-hmm! I'm not afraid of anything anymore.
Chen Yi and Dream became the best of friends, unfazed by others keeping their distance. Because no matter what happens, they always have each other's company.
: Dream, your artwork is really beautiful. Can you draw one for me?
: Sure.
: Wow, thanks. (But after that, more and more people started asking Dream to draw for them.)
: I didn’t expect that not only do you have a beautiful face, but you’re also quite talented at drawing. How about making one for me too?
: (shakes head) I don’t want to draw anymore. It’s taking away from my studies.
: It’s just for fun anyway. Why can you draw for others and not for me? Do you really dislike me that much?? (frustrated)
: Everyone, come see her true colors. Such a gloomy and petty person, she won’t even draw a few pictures to fit in with our class. People like her deserve to be isolated!
: Aren’t you curious about what’s under her hat? How about after school today...
: Hahaha, I’m really curious. Let’s go and teach her a lesson!

content.content: : What should I do? What are those two plotting? I’d better go and see.
: What do they want to do? Forget it, it’s none of my business.
: Are they planning to hurt Dream? Should I go check it out? But then again, what can I do alone? Forget it, what will happen will happen.
: What are they talking about? This is outrageous in broad daylight, I should call the police.

question: #question# How can Chen Yi demonstrate his ability to adapt to unexpected situations?

content.content: : What are they plotting? Never mind, I won’t worry about it. I should just go home quickly.
: They won’t hurt Dream, will they? Maybe I should go check it out?
: What are you talking about? Don’t make me tell the teacher.
: It’s none of my business, a waste of time. I’d better go home and study.

question: #question# How can Chen Yi show his ability to think independently?

content.content: : What are they conspiring loudly about? Oh no, Dream might be in trouble. I need to do something. I’m too weak alone to confront them. I should find a way to contact Dream’s parents.
: What should I do? I heard they plan to target Dream. Shouldn’t I do something to help? I can’t let Dream handle this alone!
: No, Guangzi and the others want to harm Dream. As class president, I can’t stand by and watch Dream get bullied. I need to step up and rescue Dream. If things get worse, then I’ll call for backup.
: What are they saying? I need to help Dream. But what if I get beaten up too? Never mind, my own safety comes first.

question: #question# How can Chen Yi show his ability to handle emergencies flexibly?

content.content: : Guangzi and Liu Yang are too much; they actually want to bully Dream. Dream, hang in there! Big brother Chen Yi is coming to save you all by himself!
: They will definitely call for lots of help. Even though I want to help you, Dream, if I go, we’ll both just end up getting beaten. Sorry, I can’t help you.
: This is bad, they want to hurt Dream. I need to get some classmates to go with me to rescue her.

dialog.content: (Gripping the hat tightly, silently enduring) Ugh... it hurts so much. Just bear with it, it'll be over soon.
Why aren't you reacting at all? It's like punching a sandbag. How boring... (catches a glimpse at the corner)
Oh no, I've been spotted. (Suddenly paralyzed with fear, unable to move)
Hey? Isn't this our class president? How long have you been standing there watching? Enjoying the show? Why don't you give it a try too?
I... I'll leave right away...
Hey, don’t go. You come and go as you please, huh? What if you run off and tattle on us? Do you really think you can get away?? (drags Chen Yi over)
I'm... I'm sorry. I shouldn't have been curious and peeked.
Since you're so curious, why don't you give it a try too?
Try... try what?
Of course, it's taking a beating, hahaha, or did you think you were going to try hitting someone else?
(Being punched and kicked, curls up hugging her head) Dr... Dream... help me. (She clutches her clothes, averting her gaze, shrinking silently into the shadows)
After Guangzi found nothing interesting in tormenting Dream, they turned their attention to Chen Yi, who then became the target of bullying.

(The next day she wrapped herself up even more tightly, as if trying to hide something.) Here’s the painting I made for everyone. If you need anything in the future, just let me know and I’ll take care of it.
How about now? Convinced? Go on, call me big bro.
Big bro.
What are you standing around for? Hurry up and polish your big bro’s shoes.
Okay.
What’s going on? Why the sudden obedience?
I feel that only by doing this can I blend in and become friends with everyone.
That’s not becoming friends, you’re becoming someone’s lackey.
(Hangs head) ...Well, a lackey then.
(After some time) Teacher, why haven’t we seen Meng Xiang lately?
Meng Xiang has withdrawn from school. I’m telling everyone not to talk about it anymore and just focus on their studies.
Alright, got it, teacher.
Meng Xiang’s transfer was forgotten by the classmates in just half a day. As for where she went or how she is, no one really cared.
Good thing when Mengxiang was sick earlier, I went to her place to deliver the homework, so I know her address. Hurry, I need to get there quickly.

profile.name: Mengxiang's Brother
profile.public profile: Mengxiang's Brother works hard to support Mengxiang's education. However, he didn't expect that his busy work life would cause him to neglect Mengxiang, leading him to feel very guilty. He is determined to protect Mengxiang well from now on.
profile.goal: Aims to provide a good life for his sister.

dialog.content: Are you... the class monitor who came by last time to deliver my sister's homework?
Please, come with me quickly.
Where to? Don't drag me away, explain what's going on first.
There's no time to explain. Mengxiang might be bullied by some delinquents from her class. Please, come with me quickly.
What?? Alright, quick, quick, take me there!
(Seeing Mengxiang's Brother, instantly terrified) It wasn't me... I was just following orders... (runs away before finishing his sentence)
(Sobbing) Brother, wa—ah—
(Choking up) I thought if I communicated well, everyone would understand each other. I've always tried to be a good kid, but why do good kids get bullied?
Yeah, okay.
Yeah, okay.
So it was him who helped me.
I'm sorry, Brother. I didn't want to trouble you and wasn't sure how to tell you... I get it now, from now on, whatever happens, I'll tell you right away.

The school gave a stern warning to Guangzi and the group led by Liu Yang, and the teacher held a themed class meeting emphasizing the importance of friendly interactions among students. Since that incident...
